name: BonAuxInfos
brief:
Auxiliary information passing between Bonmin B&B components

Extends OsiBabSolver to pass solver-specific information during
branch-and-cut, including NLP solutions found by heuristics.

**Key functionality:**
- nlpSolution_: Store solutions from NLP solves/heuristics
- infeasibleNode_: Flag for cut generator detected infeasibility
- bestSolution2_: Alternate objective tracking (for bi-objective)

**Usage pattern:**
Cut generators and heuristics store found solutions here;
the B&B framework queries for incumbents.
see: BabInfo for extended version with Bab pointer
OsiBabSolver for the base class interface
